name: create_escrow
body: let escrow = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow_account ;
escrow . buyer = ctx . accounts . buyer . key () ;
escrow . seller = * ctx . accounts . seller . key ;
escrow . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("escrow_account") . unwrap () ;
let ix = anchor_lang :: solana_program :: system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . buyer . key () , & escrow . key () , amount ,) ;
anchor_lang :: solana_program :: program :: invoke (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . buyer . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . escrow_account . to_account_info () ,] ,) ? ;

name: complete_escrow
body: let escrow = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow_account ;
* * ctx . accounts . escrow_account . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= escrow . amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . seller . lamports . borrow_mut () += escrow . amount ;

fields.name: escrow_account
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = buyer , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 + 1 + 1 , seeds = [b"escrow" , buyer . key () . as_ref () , seller . key . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: seller
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: This account is properly validated through seeds and stored in escrow"]

fields.name: escrow_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"escrow" , escrow_account . buyer . as_ref () , escrow_account . seller . as_ref ()] , bump = escrow_account . bump , constraint = escrow_account . buyer == buyer . key () , constraint = ! escrow_account . is_completed @ EscrowError :: AlreadyCompleted)]

fields.name: seller
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: This account's pubkey is verified against the escrow's seller field"] # [account (mut , constraint = seller . key () == escrow_account . seller)]
